name: Basketball Academy PRO - Learn Moves and Shots
name_original: Basketball Academy PRO - Learn Moves and Shots
description:
Learn the BasketBall with passion.
Basketball Academy PRO present the v1.0 of BasketBall training & coaching for the users of Apple TV to learn the BasketBall diffrenetly. Beginners and professionals can practice these shots and moves.
* Dribbling.
* After the Dribble.
* Passes.
* 2 Persons Game.
* Shots.
* Triple Threat position.
* Posting Up.
* Shooting and much more.
Then you can compare your performance by recording your video and after watching these videos, you will definitely realize where to improve yourself as a PRO Basketball player.
Application contains HD videos that contains coaching and practice stuff for beginners as well.
Download and enjoy.
